name: Introduction to Engineering
description: Introduction to basic engineering principles and concepts, including problem solving, research, and design.

name: Engineering Analysis
description: Introduction to engineering analysis tools and techniques, including engineering mathematics, statistics, and computer programming.

name: Structural Mechanics
description: Introduction to the fundamentals of structural mechanics, including stress and strain, structural design, stability, and vibration.

name: Structural Design
description: Introduction to the design of structures, including materials, methods, and codes.

name: Structural Analysis
description: Introduction to the analysis of structures, including static and dynamic methods.

name: Advanced Structural Analysis
description: Advanced topics in structural analysis, including finite element methods and nonlinear analysis.
